Dashboard.Transactions: Number of transactions occured in the last 24 hours
Dashboard.Fee: Value of transaction fee paid in the last 24 hours
Dashboard.MarketCap: Total value of all assets held by users and liquidity pools

Chart.Liquidity: Total asset value in all liquidity pools
Chart.Volume: Total value of all assets that were traded in the last 24 hours. The chart data is accumulated on daily basis.

TopTrading.Liquidity: Total value of assets and UST in this liquidity pool
TopTrading.Volume: Value of assets traded in the last 24 hours

My.PortfolioRatio: Weight of the asset in portfolio
My.CollateralRatio: Ratio of collateral value to minted asset value
My.PositionWarning: Position is close to liquidation. Close the position or deposit more collateral.
My.PositionDanger: Position can be liquidated anytime upon request. Close the position or deposit more collateral.
My.TotalWithdrawableValue: Sum of UST value in all pools
My.Withdrawable: Amount of assets redeemable from buring "LP"
My.PoolShare: Ratio of pool balance to total pool balance.
My.StakingRatio: Ratio of staked LP to total staked LP

Trade.General: The amount of asset traded is automatically calculated based on the current price, spread and commission
Trade.Price:
Price is based on the pool ratio. The effective price changes dynamically depending on the trade size.

• Spread: Fee paid due to the difference between market price and estimated price.
• Commission: Deducted from the assets that user receives.
Trade.MinimumReceived: Expected minimum amount based on current price, maximum spread and commission

Mint.Open: New assets will be minted when collateral is deposited. Any price change of either collateral or minted assets may lead to liquidation.
Mint.ExpectedMintedAsset: The expected amount of asset minted
Mint.CollateralRatio: Ratio of collateral value to minted asset value

Pool.Provide: Receive LP by providing liquidity. LP can be staked to earn MIR as rewards.
Pool.Withdraw: Withdraw pool share by burning LP
Pool.InputAsset: Amount to add to the pool
Pool.InputUST: Equivalent amount of UST added to the pool
Pool.Output: Estimated amount of redeemed mAsset and UST
Pool.PoolPrice: The price determined by the pool ratio

Stake.MIRvolume: Total value of MIR traded in the last 24 hours
Stake.Title: LP can be staked to earn MIR as rewards. LP is obtainable by providing liquidity.
Stake.APR: Annualized LP staking return based on MIR distribution, LP staking ratio and pool value

Gov.StakingRatio: Ratio of staked MIR to total MIR
Gov.APR: Annualized MIR staking return based on MIR distribution and staking ratio
Gov.Polls: Staked MIR can be used as voting power
Gov.LPcommission: Percentage of the receiving amount from the trade sent to the liquidity pool
Gov.OwnerCommission: Percentage of the receiving amont from the trade distributed to MIR holders
Gov.AuctionDiscount: Discount rate applied to collateral sold in liquidation auction
Gov.MinimumCollateralRatio: Lowest collateral ratio which users can set to mint new assets. Position will be liquidated below this ratio
Gov.Deposit: Passing the quorum will return the deposit to the creator. Failure to pass quorum will distribute the deposit to all MIR stakers.

Swap.Rate: Swap price is calculated based on the pool price and spread
Swap.MinimumReceived: Expected minimum quantity to be received based on the current price, maximum spread, and trading fee
Swap.TradingFee: 0.3% of asset received by the user is paid to Terraswap pool
Swap.TxFee: Fee paid to execute this transaction
